tool_description: Validates customer profile operations and data handling against GDPR, CCPA, COPPA, and other privacy regulations to ensure legal compliance.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier to check compliance for

operation_context.description: Context of compliance check: data_collection, data_processing, data_sharing, data_retention, or data_deletion

customer_age.description: Customer age for COPPA and age-related compliance checks

error_messages: Customer not found: No profile exists for the provided customer_id.
Invalid regulation_framework: Provide valid regulatory framework names (GDPR, CCPA, COPPA, etc.).
Invalid operation_context: Use one of [data_collection, data_processing, data_sharing, data_retention, data_deletion].
Invalid customer_age: Age must be a positive integer between 1 and 150.
Compliance check failed: Unable to complete compliance validation due to missing consent data.
usage: Provide customer_id, regulation_framework, and operation_context to validate compliance. Include customer_age and customer_location for jurisdiction-specific checks.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, or requires_attention

recommendations.description: List of recommended actions to achieve compliance

applicable_regulations.description: List of regulations that apply to this customer
